description.message: Performance budget checks if your site will load fast enough based on the size of your resources and a given connection speed

errorTryingToGet.description: Debug infomration to show when there is an error getting the rawResponse
errorTryingToGet.message: Error trying to get the `rawResponse` for $1. Using uncompressedSize instead

idealTotalTime.description: Debug information to show the ideal total time

toLoadAllResources.description: Report message when the validation fails
toLoadAllResources.message: To load all the resources on a $1 network, it will take about $2s in optimal conditions (that is $3s more than the $4s target).

totalDNS.description: Debug information to show when the DNS lookup time is calculated

totalRedirect.description: Debug information to show when the redirect time is calculated

totalTLS.description: Debug information to show when the TLS handshake time is calculated

validating.description: Debug information to show when the validation starts
